list.abs: 首开记录On the scoreboard一面倒Lopsided win oneside game攻势Attack
单面煎(oneside)，也就是我们常说的太阳蛋。也有很多人管单面煎蛋叫sunny-sideup或者Runningegg。
main.tex -  hrbeuthesis -  ... ... {twoside} 双面打印 {oneside} 单面打印 {Arts} 艺术学.

entry.tran: 不均衡的；一边倒的；悬殊的
entry.def: If you say that an activity or relationship is one-sided, you think that one of the people or groups involved does much more than the other or is much stronger than the other.

example.tran: 谈判完全呈一边倒之势。

example.ex: Muster needed just 72 minutes to win the one-sided match, 6-2, 6-3.
example.tran: 穆斯特尔仅用72分钟便以6比2、6比3拿下了这场实力悬殊的比赛。

entry.tran: 片面的；偏颇的；不公正的
entry.def: If you describe someone as one-sided, you are critical of what they say or do because you think it shows that they have considered only one side of an issue or event.

example.ex: The organisation still believes the government is being one sided...
example.tran: 该组织仍然认为政府有失公允。

example.ex: There has been a very one-sided account of her problems with Ted.
example.tran: 关于她与特德的问题，有一则非常片面的报道。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
